trans-unit.source: If null, the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 Null，預設的 HTTP 為 POST，而 FTP 則為 STOR。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that is passed to the method invoked when the asynchronous operation completes
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的物件，這個物件會在非同步作業完成時傳遞至叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Opens a stream for writing data to the specified resource, using the specified method.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的方法開啟資料流，以將資料寫入至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擷取用來將資料傳送給資源的可寫入資料流。

trans-unit.source: The stream is retrieved asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式擷取的資料流。

trans-unit.source: To receive notification when the stream is available, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.OpenWriteCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收通知，資料流時，加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Net.WebClient.OpenWriteCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the stream are sent to the server when you close the stream.
trans-unit.target: 資料流的內容會傳送到伺服器時關閉資料流。

trans-unit.source: If the `method` parameter specifies a method that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`參數會指定不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況的方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to indicate the error.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Net.WebException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is being opened.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不開啟資料流時封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To block while waiting for the stream, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.OpenWrite%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖等候資料流時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.OpenWrite%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="address" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI formed by combining <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> and <paramref name="address" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 合併 <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> 和 <paramref name="address" /> 而形成的 URI 是無效的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred while opening the stream.
trans-unit.target: 開啟資料流時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous operation to open a stream to write data to a resource completes.
trans-unit.target: 在開啟資料流以將資料寫入資源的非同步作業完成時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised each time an asynchronous operation to open a stream that is used to send data to a resource completes.
trans-unit.target: 每次開啟用來將資料傳送至資源資料流的非同步作業完成時，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: These operations are started by calling the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.OpenWriteAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 這些作業會藉由呼叫啟動<xref:System.Net.WebClient.OpenWriteAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler> is the delegate for this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler>是針對此事件的委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs> class provides the event handler with event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs>類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Opens a stream for writing data to the specified resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式開啟資料流，將資料寫入指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: These methods do not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the data.
trans-unit.target: 要接收資料之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Opens a stream for writing data to the specified resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式開啟資料流，將資料寫入指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> used to write data to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件上的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 屬性會傳回用來將資料寫入資源的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after the a writable stream to the data resource has been opened.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件之後，才會完成已開啟的資料資源的可寫入資料流。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is opening.
trans-unit.target: 開啟資料流時，這個方法不會不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance used to write data to the resource specified by the `address` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擷取<xref:System.IO.Stream>用來將資料寫入至指定的資源執行個體`address`參數。

trans-unit.source: The stream is obtained using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 使用自動配置的執行緒資源，從執行緒集區取得資料流。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> when you are finished with the <xref:System.IO.Stream> to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>您已完成<xref:System.IO.Stream>若要避免系統資源不足。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the data.
trans-unit.target: 要接收資料之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The method used to send the data to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳送資料給資源所使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: If null, the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 Null，預設的 HTTP 為 POST，而 FTP 則為 STOR。

trans-unit.source: Opens a stream for writing data to the specified resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.

trans-unit.source: If the `method` parameter specifies a method that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`參數會指定不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況的方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to indicate the error.

trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="address" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI formed by combining <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> and <paramref name="address" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 合併 <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> 和 <paramref name="address" /> 而形成的 URI 是無效的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred while opening the stream.
trans-unit.target: 開啟資料流時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proxy used by this <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebClient" /> 物件使用的 Proxy。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebProxy" /> instance used to send requests.
trans-unit.target: 用於傳送要求的 <see cref="T:System.Net.IWebProxy" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebClient.Proxy%2A> property identifies the <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> instance that communicates with remote servers on behalf of this <xref:System.Net.WebClient> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebClient.Proxy%2A>屬性會識別<xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>代表這與遠端伺服器通訊的執行個體<xref:System.Net.WebClient>物件。

trans-unit.source: The proxy is set by the system using configuration files and the Internet Explorer Local Area Network settings.
trans-unit.target: Proxy 會使用組態檔和 Internet Explorer 區域網路設定系統設定。

trans-unit.source: To specify that no proxy should be used, set the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.Proxy%2A> property to the proxy instance returned by the <xref:System.Net.GlobalProxySelection.GetEmptyWebProxy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 指定應沒有任何 proxy，請設定<xref:System.Net.WebClient.Proxy%2A>proxy 執行個體所傳回的屬性<xref:System.Net.GlobalProxySelection.GetEmptyWebProxy%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For information on automatic proxy detection, see [Automatic Proxy Detection](~/docs/framework/network-programming/automatic-proxy-detection.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需自動 proxy 偵測資訊，請參閱[自動 Proxy 偵測](~/docs/framework/network-programming/automatic-proxy-detection.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.Proxy" /> is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.Proxy" /> 設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: that is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 這是不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of query name/value pairs associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與要求相關的查詢名稱/值組合的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that contains query name/value pairs associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />，包含與這個要求相關的查詢標題名稱/值組合。

trans-unit.source: If no pairs are associated with the request, the value is an empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有名稱/值組合與要求相關聯，則值為空的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property contains a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection> instance containing name/value pairs that are appended to the URI as a query string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性包含<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>包含會附加至 URI 查詢字串的名稱/值組的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property are preceded by a question mark (?), and name/value pairs are separated from one another by an ampersand (&).
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性會加上問號 （？），而且，名稱/值組會從另一個分隔以連字號 (&)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example takes user input from the command line and builds a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection> that is assigned to the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會接受使用者輸入，從命令列，並建置<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>，指派給<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: It then downloads the response from the server to a local file.
trans-unit.target: 它然後回應從伺服器下載到本機檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: 取得與回應相關聯標頭名稱/值組的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> containing header name/value pairs associated with the response, or <see langword="null" /> if no response has been received.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" />，包含與回應關聯的標頭名稱/值組，或如果未接收到回應，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebClient.ResponseHeaders%2A> property contains a <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> instance containing header information the <xref:System.Net.WebClient> receives with the response.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebClient.ResponseHeaders%2A>屬性包含<xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>包含標頭資訊的執行個體<xref:System.Net.WebClient>接收回應。

trans-unit.source: The following code example downloads and displays the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.ResponseHeaders%2A> returned by a server.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會下載並顯示<xref:System.Net.WebClient.ResponseHeaders%2A>伺服器所傳回。

trans-unit.source: Uploads a data buffer to a resource with the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 將資料緩衝區上載至含有指定之 URI 的資源。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the data.
trans-unit.target: 要接收資料之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The data buffer to send to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至資源的資料緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Uploads a data buffer to a resource identified by a URI.
trans-unit.target: 將資料緩衝區上載至由 URI 識別的資源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the body of the response from the resource.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，包含來自資源的回應主體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A> method sends a data buffer to a resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A>方法會傳送給資源的資料緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器不了解基礎的要求，基礎的通訊協定類別會判斷發生何種狀況。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to indicate the error.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Net.WebException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A> method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A>方法會將傳送的內容`data`伺服器，而不予以編碼。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while uploading the data.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封鎖將上傳資料時。

trans-unit.source: To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: If null, the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的方法，將資料緩衝區上載至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A> method sends a data buffer to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter, and returns any response from the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A>方法會傳送資料緩衝區資源，使用中指定的 HTTP 方法至`method`參數，並從伺服器傳回任何回應。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred while uploading the data.
trans-unit.target: 上載資料時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There was no response from the server hosting the resource.
trans-unit.target: 沒有來自裝載 (Host) 資源之伺服器的回應。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the data.
trans-unit.target: 要接收資料之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP method used to send the data to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳送資料給資源所使用的 HTTP 方法。

trans-unit.source: If null, the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 Null，預設的 HTTP 為 POST，而 FTP 則為 STOR。

trans-unit.source: The data buffer to send to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至資源的資料緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Uploads a data buffer to the specified resource, using the specified method.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的方法，將資料緩衝區上載至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the body of the response from the resource.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，包含來自資源的回應主體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A> method sends a data buffer to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter, and returns any response from the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A>方法會傳送資料緩衝區資源，使用中指定的 HTTP 方法至`method`參數，並從伺服器傳回任何回應。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while uploading the data.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封鎖將上傳資料時。

trans-unit.source: To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A> method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A>方法會將傳送的內容`data`伺服器，而不予以編碼。

trans-unit.source: If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`參數會指定不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to indicate the error.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Net.WebException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="address" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI formed by combining <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" />, and <paramref name="address" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 合併 <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> 和 <paramref name="address" /> 而形成的 URI 是無效的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred while uploading the data.
trans-unit.target: 上載資料時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There was no response from the server hosting the resource.
trans-unit.target: 沒有來自裝載 (Host) 資源之伺服器的回應。

trans-unit.source: Uploads a data buffer to a resource identified by a URI.
trans-unit.target: 將資料緩衝區上載至由 URI 識別的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the data.
trans-unit.target: 要接收資料之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The data buffer to send to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至資源的資料緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Uploads a data buffer to a resource identified by a URI, using the POST method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 POST 方法，將資料緩衝區上載至由 URI 識別的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This method sends a data buffer to a resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳送至資源的資料緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送的資料緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The data is not encoded.
trans-unit.target: 未編碼的資料。

trans-unit.source: To receive notification when the data upload completes, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收通知，資料上傳完成時，加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread while the data is being sent.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會在傳送資料時封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To send data and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳送的資料與區塊等待伺服器回應時，請使用其中<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("")，和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的方法並辨識語彙基元 (Token)，將資料緩衝區上載至由 URI 識別的資源。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous data-upload operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步資料上載作業完成時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised each time an asynchronous data upload operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 每次非同步資料上傳作業完成時，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous data uploads are started by calling the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫啟動非同步資料上載<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.UploadDataCompletedEventHandler> is the delegate for this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.UploadDataCompletedEventHandler>是針對此事件的委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.UploadDataCompletedEventArgs> class provides the event handler with event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.UploadDataCompletedEventArgs>類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Uploads a data buffer that contains a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array to the URI specified as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式，將包含 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列的資料緩衝區上傳至指定的 URI。

trans-unit.source: These methods do not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the data.
trans-unit.target: 要接收資料之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The data buffer to send to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至資源的資料緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Uploads a data buffer that contains a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array to the URI specified as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式，將包含 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列的資料緩衝區上傳至指定的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the body of the response received from the resource when the data buffer was uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件上的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 屬性會傳回包含上傳資料緩衝區時接收自資源之回應主體的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after the a data buffer has been uploaded to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>之後才會完成的物件資料緩衝區已上傳的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method sends a data buffer to a resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳送至資源的資料緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送的資料緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The data is not encoded.
trans-unit.target: 未編碼的資料。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("")，和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: Uploads a data buffer that contains a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array to the URI specified as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式，將包含 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列的資料緩衝區上傳至指定的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the body of the response received from the resource when the data buffer was uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件上的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 屬性會傳回包含上傳資料緩衝區時接收自資源之回應主體的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified local file to a resource with the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的本機檔案上載至具有指定之 URI 的資源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the body of the response from the resource.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，包含來自資源的回應主體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A> method sends a local file to a resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>方法會將本機檔案傳送到資源。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while uploading the file.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封鎖將上傳檔案時。

trans-unit.source: To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `POST` method is defined by HTTP.
trans-unit.target: `POST`方法由 HTTP 所定義。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying request does not use HTTP and `POST` is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎要求不會使用 HTTP 和`POST`不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to indicate the error.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Net.WebException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uploads the specified file to the specified URI using <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將指定的檔案上傳至指定的 URI 使用<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Any response returned by the server is displayed on the console.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器傳回的任何回應會顯示在主控台上。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that can accept posted files and is suitable for use with the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，可以接受張貼的檔案，因此適合用於搭配<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The page must reside on a Web server.
trans-unit.target: 頁面必須位於 Web 伺服器上。

trans-unit.source: Its address provides the value for the `address` parameter of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 其位址提供的值`address`參數<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 沒有來自裝載 (Host) 資源之伺服器的回應。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see langword="Content-type" /> header begins with <see langword="multipart" />.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see langword="Content-type" /> 開頭的 <see langword="multipart" /> 頁首。

trans-unit.source: to access the local file.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取本機檔案。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the file.
trans-unit.target: 要接收檔案之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For example, ftp://localhost/samplefile.txt.
trans-unit.target: 例如 ftp://localhost/samplefile.txt.

trans-unit.source: The file to send to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至資源的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, "samplefile.txt".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"samplefile.txt"。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified local file to a resource with the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的本機檔案上載至具有指定之 URI 的資源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the body of the response from the resource.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，包含來自資源的回應主體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A> method sends a local file to a resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>方法會將本機檔案傳送到資源。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while uploading the file.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封鎖將上傳檔案時。

trans-unit.source: To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `POST` method is defined by HTTP.
trans-unit.target: `POST`方法由 HTTP 所定義。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying request does not use HTTP and `POST` is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎要求不會使用 HTTP 和`POST`不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to indicate the error.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Net.WebException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: The method used to send the file to the resource.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" />, the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.

trans-unit.source: The file to send to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至資源的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified local file to the specified resource, using the specified method.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的方法，將指定的本機檔案上載至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the body of the response from the resource.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，包含來自資源的回應主體。

trans-unit.source: When address specifies an HTTP resource, the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A> method sends a local file to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter and returns any response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 當位址會指定 HTTP 資源，<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>方法會將本機檔案傳送至使用中指定的 HTTP 方法的資源`method`參數，並從伺服器傳回任何回應。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while uploading the file.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封鎖將上傳檔案時。

trans-unit.source: To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server or the `address` resource, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`參數會指定伺服器無法辨識的動詞命令或`address`資源，基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> is thrown with the <xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A> property set to indicate the error.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Net.WebException>會擲回<xref:System.Net.WebException.Status%2A>屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uploads the specified file to the specified URI using <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將指定的檔案上傳至指定的 URI 使用<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Any response returned by the server is displayed on the console.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器傳回的任何回應會顯示在主控台上。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that can accept posted files and is suitable for use with the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，可以接受張貼的檔案，因此適合用於搭配<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The page must reside on a Web server.
trans-unit.target: 頁面必須位於 Web 伺服器上。

trans-unit.source: Its address provides the value for the `address` parameter of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified local file to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的本機檔案上載至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: These methods do not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the file.
trans-unit.target: 要接收檔案之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.
trans-unit.target: 對於 HTTP 資源而言，這個 URI 必須識別出可以接受使用 POST 方法傳送之要求的資源，例如指令碼或 ASP 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The file to send to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至資源的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified local file to the specified resource, using the POST method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 POST 方法，將指定的本機檔案上載至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。

trans-unit.source: To receive notification when the file upload completes, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收通知，檔案上傳完成時，加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread while the file is being sent.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，檔案會在傳送時。

trans-unit.source: To send a file and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要等待伺服器回應時傳送的檔案和區塊，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.target: 合併 <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> 和 <paramref name="address" /> 而形成的 URI 是無效的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="fileName" /> is <see langword="null" />, is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, contains invalid character, or the specified path to the file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileName" /> 是 <see langword="null" />、<see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />、含有無效的字元，或者指定的檔案路徑不存在。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred while opening the stream.
trans-unit.target: 開啟資料流時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There was no response from the server hosting the resource.
trans-unit.target: 沒有來自裝載 (Host) 資源之伺服器的回應。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see langword="Content-type" /> header begins with <see langword="multipart" />.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see langword="Content-type" /> 開頭的 <see langword="multipart" /> 頁首。

trans-unit.source: to access the local file.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取本機檔案。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the file.
trans-unit.target: 要接收檔案之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.
trans-unit.target: 對於 HTTP 資源而言，這個 URI 必須識別出可以接受使用 POST 方法傳送之要求的資源，例如指令碼或 ASP 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The method used to send the data to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳送資料給資源所使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" />, the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 <see langword="null" />，預設的 HTTP 為 POST，而 FTP 則為 STOR。

trans-unit.source: The file to send to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至資源的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified local file to the specified resource, using the POST method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 POST 方法，將指定的本機檔案上載至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。

trans-unit.source: To receive notification when the file upload completes, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要接收通知，檔案上傳完成時，加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread while the file is being sent.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，檔案會在傳送時。

trans-unit.source: To send a file and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要等待伺服器回應時傳送的檔案和區塊，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous file-upload operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步檔案上載作業完成時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised each time an asynchronous file upload operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 每次非同步檔案上傳作業完成時，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous file uploads are started by calling the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫啟動非同步檔案上載<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadFileAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.UploadFileCompletedEventHandler> is the delegate for this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.UploadFileCompletedEventHandler>是針對此事件的委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.UploadFileCompletedEventArgs> class provides the event handler with event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.UploadFileCompletedEventArgs>類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified local file to a resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式將指定的本機檔案上傳至資源。

trans-unit.source: These methods do not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the file.
trans-unit.target: 要接收檔案之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.
trans-unit.target: 對於 HTTP 資源而言，這個 URI 必須識別出可以接受使用 POST 方法傳送之要求的資源，例如指令碼或 ASP 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The local file to send to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至資源的本機檔案。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified local file to a resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式將指定的本機檔案上傳至資源。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the body of the response received from the resource when the file was uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件上的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 屬性會傳回包含上傳檔案時接收自資源之回應主體的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after the file has been uploaded to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件會在已上傳至資源的檔案之後, 完成。

trans-unit.source: The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="address" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="fileName" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileName" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI formed by combining <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> and <paramref name="address" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 合併 <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> 和 <paramref name="address" /> 而形成的 URI 是無效的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="fileName" /> is <see langword="null" />, is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, contains invalid character, or the specified path to the file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileName" /> 是 <see langword="null" />、<see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />、含有無效的字元，或者指定的檔案路徑不存在。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An error occurred while opening the stream.
trans-unit.target: 開啟資料流時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There was no response from the server hosting the resource.
trans-unit.target: 沒有來自裝載 (Host) 資源之伺服器的回應。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see langword="Content-type" /> header begins with <see langword="multipart" />.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see langword="Content-type" /> 開頭的 <see langword="multipart" /> 頁首。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the file.
trans-unit.target: 要接收檔案之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.
trans-unit.target: 對於 HTTP 資源而言，這個 URI 必須識別出可以接受使用 POST 方法傳送之要求的資源，例如指令碼或 ASP 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The method used to send the data to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳送資料給資源所使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="null" />, the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 <see langword="null" />，預設的 HTTP 為 POST，而 FTP 則為 STOR。

trans-unit.source: The local file to send to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至資源的本機檔案。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified local file to a resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式將指定的本機檔案上傳至資源。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns a <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array containing the body of the response received from the resource when the file was uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件上的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 屬性會傳回包含上傳檔案時接收自資源之回應主體的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after the file has been uploaded to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件會在已上傳至資源的檔案之後, 完成。

trans-unit.source: The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: BY default, this method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous upload operation successfully transfers some or all of the data.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步上傳作業成功傳輸部分或全部資料時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised each time an asynchronous upload makes progress.
trans-unit.target: 每次非同步上傳有進展時，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when uploads are started using any of the following methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用下列方法之一啟動上傳時，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Sends a <xref:System.Byte> array to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 傳送<xref:System.Byte>陣列資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Sends a local file to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 本機將檔案傳送至資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Sends a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection> to the resource and returns a <xref:System.Byte> array containing any response, without blocking the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 傳送<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>資源並傳回<xref:System.Byte>陣列，包含任何回應，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventHandler> is the delegate for this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventHandler>是針對此事件的委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs> class provides the event handler with event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.UploadProgressChangedEventArgs>類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示這個事件處理常式的實作。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified string to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的字串上傳至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the string.
trans-unit.target: 要接收字串之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For Http resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.
trans-unit.target: 對於 HTTP 資源而言，這個 URI 必須識別出可以接受使用 POST 方法傳送之要求的資源，例如指令碼或 ASP 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The string to be uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 要上傳的字串。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified string to the specified resource, using the POST method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 POST 方法，將指定的字串上載至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the response sent by the server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含由伺服器傳送的回應。

trans-unit.source: Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a <xref:System.Byte> array using the encoding specified in the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.Encoding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 上傳之前的字串，這個方法轉換成<xref:System.Byte>陣列使用中指定的編碼<xref:System.Net.WebClient.Encoding%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while the string is transmitted.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在傳輸字串時封鎖。

trans-unit.source: To send a string and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要將字串傳送，並繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("")，和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.source: To send a string and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要將字串傳送，並繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("")，和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用上傳 FTP 資源增加命令。

trans-unit.source: For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資源，會使用 POST 方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="address" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="data" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI formed by combining <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> and <paramref name="address" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 合併 <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> 和 <paramref name="address" /> 而形成的 URI 是無效的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There was no response from the server hosting the resource.
trans-unit.target: 沒有來自裝載 (Host) 資源之伺服器的回應。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the string.
trans-unit.target: 要接收字串之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: This URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the <c>method</c> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個 URI 必須識別出可接受以 <c>method</c> 方法傳送之要求的資源。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP method used to send the string to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 將字串傳送至資源時所使用的 HTTP 方法。

trans-unit.source: If null, the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 Null，預設的 HTTP 為 POST，而 FTP 則為 STOR。

trans-unit.source: The string to be uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 要上傳的字串。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified string to the specified resource, using the specified method.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的方法，將指定的字串上載至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the response sent by the server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含由伺服器傳送的回應。

trans-unit.source: Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a <xref:System.Byte> array using the encoding specified in the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.Encoding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 上傳之前的字串，這個方法轉換成<xref:System.Byte>陣列使用中指定的編碼<xref:System.Net.WebClient.Encoding%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while the string is transmitted.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在傳輸字串時封鎖。

trans-unit.source: To send a string and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要將字串傳送，並繼續執行等待伺服器回應時，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: These methods do not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the string.
trans-unit.target: 要接收字串之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.
trans-unit.target: 對於 HTTP 資源而言，這個 URI 必須識別出可以接受使用 POST 方法傳送之要求的資源，例如指令碼或 ASP 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The string to be uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 要上傳的字串。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified string to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的字串上傳至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This method sends a string to a resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將字串傳送到資源。

trans-unit.source: The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 字串會使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式進行傳送。

trans-unit.source: Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a <xref:System.Byte> array using the encoding specified in the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.Encoding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 上傳之前的字串，這個方法轉換成<xref:System.Byte>陣列使用中指定的編碼<xref:System.Net.WebClient.Encoding%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 為字串上傳完成時收到通知，您可以加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，字串會在傳送時。

trans-unit.source: To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要等待伺服器回應時傳送字串，而區塊，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a <xref:System.Byte> array using the encoding specified in the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.Encoding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 上傳之前的字串，這個方法轉換成<xref:System.Byte>陣列使用中指定的編碼<xref:System.Net.WebClient.Encoding%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 為字串上傳完成時收到通知，您可以加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，字串會在傳送時。

trans-unit.source: To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要等待伺服器回應時傳送字串，而區塊，使用其中一種<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="address" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="data" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The URI formed by combining <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> and <paramref name="address" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 合併 <see cref="P:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress" /> 和 <paramref name="address" /> 而形成的 URI 是無效的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="method" /> cannot be used to send content.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用 <paramref name="method" /> 傳送內容。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There was no response from the server hosting the resource.
trans-unit.target: 沒有來自裝載 (Host) 資源之伺服器的回應。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous string-upload operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步字串上傳作業完成時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised each time an asynchronous string upload operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 每次非同步字串上傳作業完成時，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous string uploads are started by calling the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫啟動非同步字串上載<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadStringAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.UploadStringCompletedEventHandler> is the delegate for this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.UploadStringCompletedEventHandler>是針對此事件的委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.UploadStringCompletedEventArgs> class provides the event handler with event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.UploadStringCompletedEventArgs>類別提供的事件資料的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified string to the specified resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式將指定的字串上傳至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: These methods do not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the resource to receive the string.
trans-unit.target: 要接收字串之資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For HTTP resources, this URI must identify a resource that can accept a request sent with the POST method, such as a script or ASP page.
trans-unit.target: 對於 HTTP 資源而言，這個 URI 必須識別出可以接受使用 POST 方法傳送之要求的資源，例如指令碼或 ASP 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The string to be uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 要上傳的字串。

trans-unit.source: Uploads the specified string to the specified resource as an asynchronous operation using a task object.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式將指定的字串上傳至指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the response sent by the server.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件上的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 屬性會傳回包含伺服器所傳送之回應的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after the string has been uploaded to the resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>物件會完成之後已上傳至資源的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 字串會使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式進行傳送。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業<xref:System.Net.WebClient.CancelAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a <xref:System.Byte> array using the encoding specified in the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.Encoding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 上傳之前的字串，這個方法轉換成<xref:System.Byte>陣列使用中指定的編碼<xref:System.Net.WebClient.Encoding%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while the string is transmitted.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會在傳輸字串時封鎖。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with <xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A> to form the absolute URI of the requested data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合<xref:System.Net.WebClient.BaseAddress%2A>形成要求資料的絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A> property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.WebClient.QueryString%2A>屬性不是空字串時，附加至`address`。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
